data.message: I think it's creepy y'all can access camera and speaker remotely from messenger app.  Any comments on that? Doesn't say that blatantly but I'm sure most people would want to know more about that or I be able to prevent that from happening. Right?  Isn't doing what's right for the customer important?

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Arpan. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/YjcUw1  -Ryan
Facebook Make It sound Like we Have An Opption about using the messenger App ! The messenger App is a waste of time and memory on my Device !! Worst Thing You Done Fb
Yeah.   Go back to how it was.  Too many complaints.
Hi,My facebook(https://www.facebook.com/sofya.martirosyan.79?fref=ts) don't open,why?Please solve this problem...  PLEASE
Messenger app IS a waste of space and shouldn't be required.  I wouldn't use it at all if I didn't HAVE to to read my messages on my phone.
I have since removed it.  Been very happy
